name: Nerdotellis
description:
A nerdy girl named Ava has been thrown on the top floor of a wizards' crumbling tower in a cyber-cosmic incident. The only way to escape is to climb down the tower floors one by one, solving the puzzles to collect all the crystal shards on the way down. With the crystal shards, the wizard can fix the portal device that can transport Ava back home to her world.

Explore and solve 25 levels in this top-down puzzle game by collecting crystal shards to open the trap door that leads to the next level. But beware, the wizards' tower is old and most floor tiles will crumble after you leave them, so choose your path wisely.

Controls W, A, S, D Move up, left, down or right R Restart the current level
Esc / F10 Open the menu

The controls are rebindable in the options menu.

Soundtrack

You can find the Original Game Soundtrack composed by Frank Todt on Bandcamp for download.

Please note that the Soundtrack falls under a different license than the game assets. Installation

Simply unzip the archive and start the executable to run the game, no installation is required.

Requirements

See here for the official Hardware and Software Specifications of the Unreal Engine 4.

Recommended Hardware
  • Operating System: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Video Card/DirectX Version: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
Minimum Software Requirements
  • Operating System: Windows 7
  • DirectX Runtime: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
